thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Martha

author: Martha
title: Martha
text: Already being in a frantic haze getting my daughter ready for daycare, I wasn't too eager to throw another "to do" on the list, but I was asked to get labels or write on her clothing. After hearing about Mabel's Labels through a fellow mom, I checked out the website on my lunch break at work. Not expecting that the process would be so simple, I was surprised and excited to order my labels over my phone! The selections were made easy and the creative aspect was clear to follow and there were so many options for design! I never thought I would actually have fun during a task of preschool prep. Thank you, Mabel's Labels! Up next, my husband's lunch box labels.
